name: Demo Online BattleRoyale
description:
I don't know what i can type about the game. There is just sourcecode and a video that shows gameplay. Normally there wasn't any bug that I remember but when I reopened the project, I couldn't be follewed by my soldiers. 

Every players have  soldiers that they control. You give directions like take item from ground  , stay , follow, attack. Every soldier have own inventory. If you kill opponent's soldier, you can get the soldier to your army if the soldier could alive. Also there is a prodecural map and field of view of each soldiers.

Any build doesn't exist because I didn't want to rid of bugs after finding them in  the reopening. So you have to fix bugs :)
